query.name: get_all_assets
query.sql:
SELECT uplink_equipment.*, uplink_equipment_type.name, uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id, (uplink_location_address.name) as location_address_name, upsell_priorities.name as priority_name,upsell_lines_of_business.name as lob_name, uplink_equipment_type_container.equipment_type_container_id, uplink_equipment_type_container.name as container_name
FROM (uplink_equipment, uplink_equipment_type,uplink_location_equipment, uplink_location_address)
LEFT JOIN uplink_equipment_container
ON (uplink_equipment_container.equipment_id=uplink_equipment.equipment_id AND uplink_equipment_container.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment_container.account_id=?)
LEFT JOIN uplink_equipment_type_container ON (uplink_equipment_type_container.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id AND uplink_equipment_type_container.equipment_type_container_id=uplink_equipment_container.equipment_type_container_id AND uplink_equipment_type_container.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment_type_container.account_id=?)
LEFT JOIN upsell_priorities ON (upsell_priorities.priority_id=uplink_equipment_container.priority_id AND upsell_priorities.deletion_datetime > ? AND upsell_priorities.account_id=?)
LEFT JOIN upsell_lines_of_business ON (upsell_lines_of_business.line_of_business_id=uplink_equipment_container.business_line_id AND upsell_lines_of_business.deletion_datetime >? AND upsell_lines_of_business.account_id=?)
WHERE
uplink_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_equipment.account_id = ? AND uplink_equipment.equipment_type_id=uplink_equipment_type.equipment_type_id
AND uplink_location_equipment.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_equipment.account_id=? AND uplink_location_equipment.equipment_id=uplink_equipment.equipment_id
AND uplink_location_address.location_address_id=uplink_location_equipment.location_address_id AND uplink_location_address.deletion_datetime > ? AND uplink_location_address.location_address_id=? AND uplink_location_address.account_id=?
AND uplink_equipment_type.account_id=? AND uplink_equipment_type.deletion_datetime > ?
ORDER BY equipment_id, container_name
